effects.name:
While wielding this weapon you can make a check at a -6 with your weapon skill base when targeted by a ranged attack to parry the attack. If your roll beats the attackerâ€™s attack roll, you can choose a target within 10m. That target must take a defense action against your initial weapon skill roll or be Staggered by the flying projectile. 
If you have levels in the Parry Arrows
ability, instead you gain a +2 to it when wielding this weapon.
